resources.string: Resistor Calculation Designed and Develop by ISMAIL OLALEKAN R. to help Engineering student in their field in chosen correct resistor to use for their component, this application return the corresponding resistor value when supplied with the color and the resistors color bands when supplied with the resistor value. For more Engineering Application or commen about this app, +2348139263853 or orismail@student.lautech.edu.ng
